channel.title: Non Standard Evaluation on MuayData blog
channel.description: Recent content in Non Standard Evaluation on MuayData blog

item.title: Do not invoke me, apply yourself
item.description: You know how to apply a function to a list of elements (apply, purrr:map) but can we do something similar to apply a list of functions to the same data/arguments? In this short post we will answer that question.
